attributes.action: Abolish Income Tax and raise the difference on non-essential luxury goods by increasing VAT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently those persons in the country earning the median range of salaries have approximately 33% of their take home pay deducted as Income Tax.

This should be abolished such that the individual can choose to save for their long term future, purchase luxury goods with VAT set to recover that lost by abolishing income tax or used to pucrhase essential goods, at current levels of taxation.
